article.title: Status and history for [sin]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: stage 5: translation reviewed, thanks to Keshan Sodimana and Sascha Brawer.
stage 4: translation to Unicode, thanks to Keshan Sodimana, Pasundu de Silva and Sascha Brawer.
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
